full_text: SUNDAY 10/3 IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR J.E. DATE 10/1/05 TIME 9:50 A.M. M Sarah OF PHONE/MOBILE TELEPHONED CAME TO SEE YOU WANTS TO SEE YOU RETURNED YOUR CALL PLEASE CALL WILL CALL AGAIN RUSH SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE confirmed at 11AM - 4 PM and SIGNED a 118- Public Records Request No.: 17-295 07/26/17 Page 2635 DOJ-OGR-00032948
